LanguageData.NY_thought_BeautyLookPC.stages.0.label: heavenly sight of papercut loong
LanguageData.NY_thought_BeautyLookPC.stages.0.descrip: I almost thought that was Venus passing by.
LanguageData.NY_thought_BeautyPC.stages.0.label: display of self
LanguageData.NY_thought_BeautyPC.stages.0.description: Instead of shame, I take great pride in displaying my body and astonishing my audiences.
